Text: Real Options Conference Speaker Confirmation Cc Steven Further to our conversation I am delighted that you will be speaking at the forthcoming Real Options conference which will take place on Monday th Tuesday th November in Central London I have attached the pdf of the conference Vince spoke at in February and the draft programme of the November conference As discussed could you please email me with a suggested talk title and between and bullet points to be included in the conference programme It would be great if you could emphasise the practicality of your talk and that you will be using your own experience of working with real options at Enron as part of the talk If you do have the delegate list from the IQPC conference it would be useful to see who attended so that we can improve on our marketing for the conference in november You can either email me or fax it to me on I look forward to receiving your talk in the next day or so Kind regards Julia Julia Shaw Senior Conference Producer Tel Fax Email Web addresswwwiirconferencescom progpdf talktitlesrtf
